Documentation about memory
==========================

If you want to better understand things about memory managment you can
probably be interested by the following documents :

What Every Programer Should Now About Memory
--------------------------------------------

A very nice document written by **Urlich Drepper** in 2007, starting from the silicon to the application level.

**URL**: https://people.freebsd.org/~lstewart/articles/cpumemory.pdf

Phd. thesis about memory managment in HPC
-----------------------------------------

I made my PhD. about memory managment in HPC, you can find the final thesis (**in French**, sorry).
It contains an introduction on the memory managment stack.

**URL**: https://hal.archives-ouvertes.fr/tel-01253537/file/2014-valat-pdh-theses.pdf
